Variable.Name: lonPE
Variable.Comment: longitude of Earth's perihelion in radians

Variable.Name: lonPEdeg
Variable.Comment: longitude of Earth's perihelion in degrees

Variable.Name: lonS
Variable.Comment: ecliptic longitude of Sun as seen from Earth

Variable.Name: scale
Variable.Comment: variable to set size of viewing area in orbit view

Variable.Name: lunarEclipse
Variable.Comment: position of Earth's shadow for a lunar eclipse

Variable.Name: np
Variable.Comment: number of points used in polygons

Variable.Name: transp
Variable.Comment: variable for controling transparency of darknessPolygon (to emulate Earthlight)

Variable.Name: color
Variable.Comment: variable to control color of darknessPolygon (to emulate Earthlight)

Variable.Name: ang
Variable.Comment: intermediate angle variable for Moon phase

Variable.Name: proximityEM
Variable.Comment: relative position between Earth and Moon on Ecliptic

Variable.Name: incl
Variable.Comment: inclination of Moon's orbit (relative to ecliptic) in degrees

Variable.Name: lat
Variable.Comment: ecliptic latitude of Moon as seen from Earth

Variable.Name: lon
Variable.Comment: ecliptic longitude of Moon as seen from Earth

Variable.Name: inclDeg
Variable.Comment: inclination of Moon's orbit in degrees

Variable.Name: lonAN
Variable.Comment: longitude of Moon's ascending node in radians

Variable.Name: lonANdeg
Variable.Comment: longitude of Moon's ascending node in degrees

Variable.Name: arg
Variable.Comment: argument of Moon's perihelion in radians

Variable.Name: argDeg
Variable.Comment: argument of Moon's perihelion in degrees

Variable.Name: xlos
Variable.Comment: x-component for line of sight vector

Variable.Name: ylos
Variable.Comment: y-component for line of sight vector

Variable.Name: zlos
Variable.Comment: z-component for line of sight vector

Variable.Name: nst
Variable.Comment: number of stars in orbit view

Variable.Name: nES
Variable.Comment: number of stars in ecliptic view

Variable.Name: traceEV
Variable.Comment: to trace planet's path in ecliptic view

Variable.Name: eTrace
Variable.Comment: trace Earth's path in orbit view

Variable.Name: pTrace
Variable.Comment: trace Moon's path in orbit view

Variable.Name: lineES
Variable.Comment: show line connecting Earth and Sun

Variable.Name: los
Variable.Comment: show line of sight vector indicating apparent location of planet on Cel Globe

Variable.Name: userDef
Variable.Comment: to let the user set the orbital parameters

Variable.Name: traceon
Variable.Comment: to make Moon trail active in ecliptic view

Variable.Name: globeStars
Variable.Comment: to show stars in orbit frame

Variable.Name: eparrow
Variable.Comment: to show an arrow pointing to the location of possible eclipses

Variable.Name: sunFront
Variable.Comment: if Sun is in front of planet

Variable.Name: evStars
Variable.Comment: show stars in the ecliptic view

Content.Comment: equations of motion based on Kepler's Laws

Osejs.View.Creation.Element.Property: "設定時間大小 增加數值以加快模擬速度"
"設定時間大小 增加數值以加快模擬速度"
"設定時間大小 增加數值以加快模擬速度"
